titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the cathedrall church of York before Hi[s] Excellence the Earle of Newcastle and many of the prime nobility and gentry of the northerne covnties : at the publick thanksgiving to Almighty God for the late great victory upon Fryday, June 30, 1643, and the reducement of the west parts of Yorkeshire to obedience.
titleStmt.author: Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the cathedrall church of York before Hi[s] Excellence the Earle of Newcastle and many of the prime nobility and gentry of the northerne covnties : at the publick thanksgiving to Almighty God for the late great victory upon Fryday, June 30, 1643, and the reducement of the west parts of Yorkeshire to obedience.
titleStmt.author: Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Bramhall.
Dedication signed: Joh. Derensis [i.e. John Bramhall]
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
